00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_TURBULENCE_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_TURBULENCE_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePerlin.h"
00030 
00031 namespace noisepp
00032 {
00033         class TurbulenceElement1D : public PipelineElement1D
00034         {
00035                 private:
00036                         Real mPower;
00037                         ElementID mElement;
00038                         const PipelineElement1D *mElementPtr;
00039                         ElementID mPerlinX;
00040                         const PipelineElement1D *mPerlinXPtr;
00041 
00042                 public:
00043                         TurbulenceElement1D (const Pipeline1D *pipe, Real power, ElementID element, ElementID perlinX) :
00044                                 mPower(power), mElement(element), mPerlinX(perlinX)
00045                         {
00046                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement (mElement);
00047                                 mPerlinXPtr = pipe->getElement (mPerlinX);
00048                         }
00049                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00050                         {
00051                                 Real x0;
00052                                 x0 = x + Real(12414.0 / 65536.0);
00053                                 Real xFinal = x + (getElementValue (mPerlinXPtr, mPerlinX, x0, cache) * mPower);
00054                                 return getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, xFinal, cache);
00055                         }
00056 
00057         };
00058 
00059         class TurbulenceElement2D : public PipelineElement2D
00060         {
00061                 private:
00062                         Real mPower;
00063                         ElementID mElement;
00064                         const PipelineElement2D *mElementPtr;
00065                         ElementID mPerlinX;
00066                         const PipelineElement2D *mPerlinXPtr;
00067                         ElementID mPerlinY;
00068                         const PipelineElement2D *mPerlinYPtr;
00069 
00070                 public:
00071                         TurbulenceElement2D (const Pipeline2D *pipe, Real power, ElementID element, ElementID perlinX, ElementID perlinY) :
00072                                 mPower(power), mElement(element), mPerlinX(perlinX), mPerlinY(perlinY)
00073                         {
00074                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement (mElement);
00075                                 mPerlinXPtr = pipe->getElement (mPerlinX);
00076                                 mPerlinYPtr = pipe->getElement (mPerlinY);
00077                         }
00078                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00079                         {
00080                                 Real x0, y0;
00081                                 Real x1, y1;
00082                                 x0 = x + Real(12414.0 / 65536.0);
00083                                 y0 = y + Real(65124.0 / 65536.0);
00084                                 x1 = x + Real(26519.0 / 65536.0);
00085                                 y1 = y + Real(18128.0 / 65536.0);
00086                                 Real xFinal = x + (getElementValue (mPerlinXPtr, mPerlinX, x0, y0, cache) * mPower);
00087                                 Real yFinal = y + (getElementValue (mPerlinYPtr, mPerlinY, x1, y1, cache) * mPower);
00088                                 return getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, xFinal, yFinal, cache);
00089                         }
00090 
00091         };
00092 
00093         class TurbulenceElement3D : public PipelineElement3D
00094         {
00095                 private:
00096                         Real mPower;
00097                         ElementID mElement;
00098                         const PipelineElement3D *mElementPtr;
00099                         ElementID mPerlinX;
00100                         const PipelineElement3D *mPerlinXPtr;
00101                         ElementID mPerlinY;
00102                         const PipelineElement3D *mPerlinYPtr;
00103                         ElementID mPerlinZ;
00104                         const PipelineElement3D *mPerlinZPtr;
00105 
00106                 public:
00107                         TurbulenceElement3D (const Pipeline3D *pipe, Real power, ElementID element, ElementID perlinX, ElementID perlinY, ElementID perlinZ) :
00108                                 mPower(power), mElement(element), mPerlinX(perlinX), mPerlinY(perlinY), mPerlinZ(perlinZ)
00109                         {
00110                                 mElementPtr = pipe->getElement (mElement);
00111                                 mPerlinXPtr = pipe->getElement (mPerlinX);
00112                                 mPerlinYPtr = pipe->getElement (mPerlinY);
00113                                 mPerlinZPtr = pipe->getElement (mPerlinZ);
00114                         }
00115                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00116                         {
00117                                 Real x0, y0, z0;
00118                                 Real x1, y1, z1;
00119                                 Real x2, y2, z2;
00120                                 x0 = x + Real(12414.0 / 65536.0);
00121                                 y0 = y + Real(65124.0 / 65536.0);
00122                                 z0 = z + Real(31337.0 / 65536.0);
00123                                 x1 = x + Real(26519.0 / 65536.0);
00124                                 y1 = y + Real(18128.0 / 65536.0);
00125                                 z1 = z + Real(60493.0 / 65536.0);
00126                                 x2 = x + Real(53820.0 / 65536.0);
00127                                 y2 = y + Real(11213.0 / 65536.0);
00128                                 z2 = z + Real(44845.0 / 65536.0);
00129                                 Real xFinal = x + (getElementValue (mPerlinXPtr, mPerlinX, x0, y0, z0, cache) * mPower);
00130                                 Real yFinal = y + (getElementValue (mPerlinYPtr, mPerlinY, x1, y1, z1, cache) * mPower);
00131                                 Real zFinal = z + (getElementValue (mPerlinZPtr, mPerlinZ, x2, y2, z2, cache) * mPower);
00132                                 return getElementValue (mElementPtr, mElement, xFinal, yFinal, zFinal, cache);
00133                         }
00134 
00135         };
00136 
00140         class TurbulenceModule : public Module
00141         {
00142                 private:
00143                         Real mPower;
00144                         PerlinModule mPerlinX;
00145                         PerlinModule mPerlinY;
00146                         PerlinModule mPerlinZ;
00147 
00148                 public:
00150                         TurbulenceModule() : Module(1), mPower(1.0)
00151                         {
00152                                 setRoughness (3);
00153                                 setSeed (0);
00154                         }
00156                         void setPower (Real v)
00157                         {
00158                                 mPower = v;
00159                         }
00161                         void setRoughness (int v)
00162                         {
00163                                 mPerlinX.setOctaveCount (v);
00164                                 mPerlinY.setOctaveCount (v);
00165                                 mPerlinZ.setOctaveCount (v);
00166                         }
00168                         void setSeed (int v)
00169                         {
00170                                 mPerlinX.setSeed (v);
00171                                 mPerlinY.setSeed (v+1);
00172                                 mPerlinZ.setSeed (v+2);
00173                         }
00175                         void setFrequency (Real v)
00176                         {
00177                                 mPerlinX.setFrequency (v);
00178                                 mPerlinY.setFrequency (v);
00179                                 mPerlinZ.setFrequency (v);
00180                         }
00182                         void setQuality (int v)
00183                         {
00184                                 mPerlinX.setQuality (v);
00185                                 mPerlinY.setQuality (v);
00186                                 mPerlinZ.setQuality (v);
00187                         }
00189                         Real getPower () const
00190                         {
00191                                 return mPower;
00192                         }
00194                         int getRoughness () const
00195                         {
00196                                 return mPerlinX.getOctaveCount ();
00197                         }
00199                         int getSeed () const
00200                         {
00201                                 return mPerlinX.getSeed ();
00202                         }
00204                         Real getFrequency () const
00205                         {
00206                                 return mPerlinX.getFrequency ();
00207                         }
00209                         int getQuality () const
00210                         {
00211                                 return mPerlinX.getQuality ();
00212                         }
00214                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00215                         {
00216                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00217                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00218                                 ElementID perlinX = mPerlinX.addToPipeline(pipe);
00219                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new TurbulenceElement1D(pipe, mPower, first, perlinX));
00220                         }
00222                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00223                         {
00224                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00225                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00226                                 ElementID perlinX = mPerlinX.addToPipeline(pipe);
00227                                 ElementID perlinY = mPerlinY.addToPipeline(pipe);
00228                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new TurbulenceElement2D(pipe, mPower, first, perlinX, perlinY));
00229                         }
00231                         virtual ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00232                         {
00233                                 NoiseModuleCheckSourceModules;
00234                                 ElementID first = getSourceModule(0)->addToPipeline(pipe);
00235                                 ElementID perlinX = mPerlinX.addToPipeline(pipe);
00236                                 ElementID perlinY = mPerlinY.addToPipeline(pipe);
00237                                 ElementID perlinZ = mPerlinZ.addToPipeline(pipe);
00238                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new TurbulenceElement3D(pipe, mPower, first, perlinX, perlinY, perlinZ));
00239                         }
00241                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_TURBULENCE; }
00242 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00244                         virtual void write (utils::OutStream &stream) const;
00246                         virtual void read (utils::InStream &stream);
00247 #endif
00248         };
00249 };
00250 
00251 #endif
